title: can someone update my profile pls?
body:
leveled the account to be able to react to meddlers post in the dev corner, but the boards still dont recognize the changed status.

relogging didnt update it either. would be nice for future reference, if user log ins into the boards would automatically synch the account up with riots database and update the profile.

by the way, the level restrictions in certain areas of the boards like the dev corner and general discussion seem a bit silly. i mean their existence as a whole.

replies.body:
An account usually syncs to the boards, but it can miss sometimes.  Your post here looks to have syn'd you, though.  If this is still happening, cleaning your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) might help by removing any blocks.  

I don't have any jurisdiction over level requirements for board sections, but let your voice be heard at our [boards feedback](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation)!

I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9ZcUv8oK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T23:36:34.799+0000)
>
> An account usually syncs to the boards, but it can miss sometimes.  Your post here looks to have syn'd you, though.  If this is still happening, cleaning your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) might help by removing any blocks.  
> 
> I don't have any jurisdiction over level requirements for board sections, but let your voice be heard at our [boards feedback](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation)!
> 
> I hope that helps!

nope. that didnt do it.

>
> An account usually syncs to the boards, but it can miss sometimes.  Your post here looks to have syn'd you, though.  If this is still happening, cleaning your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) might help by removing any blocks.  
> 
> I don't have any jurisdiction over level requirements for board sections, but let your voice be heard at our [boards feedback](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation)!

ill try that. thanks.
